Through the Acts of the Convergences WOrld Forum, Convergences is pleased to share the main findings of this three days of debate and innovative ideas.

In 2015, 57 conferences and workshop have been organised in order to defend a common goal: a world Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty. To encourage the co-construction of sustainable solutions, stakeholders from companies, social entrepreneurship, microfinance and global solidarity gathered together reflect around three themes:

  • New Sustainable Development Goals: and now?
  • Economic models that accelerate the societal change.

The agenda of shared solutions in order to respond to climate change.

More than 350 speakers from 58 different nationalities shared their positions in order to build a world Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty thanks to the creation of partnerships and the development of projects with a social or environmental impact.

You can read and download the acts of the Convergences World Forum in PDF here.
